children.subject: Update: The info session is now moved to 8 PM in the social sciences building at room 170. Feel free to email if you have any questions!

history.content:
PlexTech, the club that brought you PlexHacks, is now recruiting for the Fall Semester!

PlexTech specializes in full-stack web/mobile development with modern technology stacks like Javascript frameworks (React, Angular, Node, Express, etc.), as well as relational and non-relational databases (MongoDB, SQL, PostgreSQL, etc.). We also put a special focus in implementing data-driven solutions, specializing in data aggregation, sanitation, visualization and analytics.

As we’ve successfully completed projects with high-growth startups in the past, we’re looking for eager project developers that specialize in our areas of interest, which include but are not limited to: Infrastructure and Cloud, Full Stack Web Development, Data Visualization and Analytics, Native Mobile Development, ML/AI and DevOps.

We also believe in fostering a new generation of software engineers. To carry out this mission, we offer a unique "Curriculum Track" where we provide full-length Machine Learning and Full Stack Web Development courses to students. We’re currently looking for TAs and students who are excited to learn!

If you’re interested in gaining a quality industry experience relating to software development, or to learn more about the specific topics discussed above, apply to PlexTech now!

Note: Our FINAL in-person info session will be this Friday (9/3) at 8 PM in the social sciences building at room 170! It'll be a great chance to meet and network with our team as well as learn about the different client and internal projects we have this semester. We hope to see you all there!

Website: https://lnkd.in/gZzu49S

Email: info@plextech.berkeley.edu

Application: plextech.berkeley.edu/apply
